attributes.action: Re-evaluate the fuel price situation in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We as a country have had enough of fuel prices rising way more than they need to. We as a country will stand united side by side until you listen to us once again, if fuel duty isnt reduced we will protest once again!! This petition is to show the government that the british people will stand united once more!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
